__e: Can't be doing with a girl who's just skin and bone.
In a few years, when I'm just skin and bones, can't move, can't care for myself, maybe she'd consider ending my suffering.
When I first met this one here, she was a rag and a bone and a hank of hair.
Come on. You're skin and bones. You know us.
To save its skin, the Party will tell you to resign, and in the end you will.
In a few years, when I'm just skin and bones, can't move, can't care for myself, maybe she'd consider ending my suffering.
I've heard of a tree with a fleece of gold hanging in its branches.
And so what? Then, you decided to, erm, carry the body out into the woods and pretend somebody else had done it?
So, please, leave me alone and let me live some semblance of a normal life.
